  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3533</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3533</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">És el mateix sonata que forma sonata?</string>
            <string language="en">Do 'sonata' and 'sonata form' mean the same?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">' sonata ' und ' sonata Formular ' bedeuten 
dasselbe?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le 'sonata 'et la 'forme de sonata 'signifient-ils
la même chose ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">' o sonata ' e ' o formulário do sonata ' 
significam o mesmo?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">'il sonata 'e 'la forma di sonata 'significano lo 
stesso?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"Το sonata" και η "μορφή sonata" σημαίνουν το 
ίδιο πράγμα;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) que explica com el terme sonata s'utilitza per referir-se  a un tipus d'obra o a un  tipus de forma musical.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) explaining how the word 'sonata' is used to describe both a whole piece of music and a way of structuring part of a piece of music.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">música</string>
            <string language="en">music</string>
            <string language="es">música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació musical</string>
            <string language="en">music education</string>
            <string language="es">educación musical</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">composició musical</string>
            <string language="en">musical composition</string>
            <string language="es">composición musical</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und beantworten Sie (das DURCHSCHNITTLICHE) 
Erklären, wie das Wort ' sonata ' verwendet wird, um ein 
vollständiges Stück Musik und eine Methode der Strukturierung des 
Teils eines Stückes Musik zu beschreiben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Remettez en cause et répondez à expliquer (PAR) comment 
le mot 'sonata 'est employé pour décrire un morceau entier de 
musique et une voie de structurer une partie d'un morceau de musique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda a explicar (PAR) como a palavra ' 
sonata ' é usada descrever  uma parte inteira de música e uma 
maneira de estruturar a parte de uma parte de música.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a spiegare (PAR) come la parola 'sonata
'è usata per descrivere sia una parte intera di musica che un modo di
struttura della parte di una parte di musica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) που εξηγούν πώς η λέξη 
"sonata" χρησιμοποιείται για να περιγράψει και ολόκληρο ένα 
κομμάτι της μουσικής και έναν τρόπο μέρος ενός κομματιού της 
μουσικής.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musikausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">musikalischer Aufbau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éducation de musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">composition musicale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução da música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">composição musical</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formazione di musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">composizione musicale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαίδευση μουσικής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μουσική σύνθεση</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
